code: import React,{useContext,useState}from'react';import Modal from"react-bootstrap/Modal";import{Button,Form}from"react-bootstrap";import{Context}from'../..';import{createLine}from'../../http/lineAPI';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CreateLine=_ref=>{let{show,onHide}=_ref;const{line}=useContext(Context);const[lineText,setLineText]=useState('');const addLine=()=>{const formData=new FormData();formData.append('text',lineText);createLine(formData).then(data=>onHide());};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Modal,{show:show,onHide:onHide,size:"lg",centered:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal.Header,{closeButton:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal.Title,{id:"contained-modal-title-vcenter",children:"\u0414\u043E\u0431\u0430\u0432\u0438\u0442\u044C \u0442\u0435\u043A\u0441\u0442 \u0432 \u0431\u0435\u0433\u0443\u0449\u0443\u044E \u0441\u0442\u0440\u043E\u043A\u0443"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal.Body,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Control,{className:"mt-3",placeholder:"\u0412\u0432\u0435\u0434\u0438\u0442\u0435 \u0442\u0435\u043A\u0441\u0442 \u0434\u043B\u044F \u0431\u0435\u0433\u0443\u0449\u0435\u0439 \u0441\u0442\u0440\u043E\u043A\u0438",value:lineText,onChange:e=>setLineText(e.target.value)})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Modal.Footer,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outline-danger",onClick:onHide,children:"\u0417\u0430\u043A\u0440\u044B\u0442\u044C"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outline-success",onClick:addLine,children:"\u0414\u043E\u0431\u0430\u0432\u0438\u0442\u044C"})]})]});};export default CreateLine;
